 2014-03532014-04-03AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Halal food)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (HALAL FOOD) in order to assist in properly informing Canadians when choosing halal labelled foods by requiring that halal claims on food labels, packaging or advertising material are accompanied by an indication of the body that certified it as such.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0076 Publication Date: 2014-04-23
AttachmentsAttachment
